name: {"en": "Build a Basic Website", "sv": null}
description: {"en": "Building a website can unlock a whole set of opportunities.", "sv": null}

name: {"en": "Basic Terminal & Git"}
description: {"en": "Master navigating the command line and code versioning concepts to increase your productivity as a developer."}

name: {"en": "Local PHP Environment"}
description: {"en": "Prepare your local development environment before you install and configure your first Laravel application."}

name: {"en": "Beginning PHP"}
description: {"en": "Start building dynamic, interactive web applications by learning one of the most widely used languages on the web."}

name: {"en": "Object-Oriented Programming"}
description: {"en": "Gain foundational knowledge of writing a clean, modular computer program by learning key concepts including Inheritance, Polymorphism, Abstraction and Encapsulation."}

name: {"en": "Laravel Basics"}
description: {"en": "A great starting point for developers that are new to the Laravel framework and its features."}

name: {"en": "Basic JavaScript"}
description: {"en": "Use this to turn your basic website into a dynamic web experience and start thinking like a programmer."}

name: {"en": "Module Bundlers and Tooling", "sv": null}
description: {"en": "Ease into module-bundler configuration with a Webpack wrapper that's completely optimized for use with Laravel.", "sv": null}

name: {"en": "Easy session-backed internal APIs"}
description: {"en": "Learn to build simple APIs with Laravel that will power your app's JavaScript with almost no code."}

name: {"en": "Deployments"}
description: {"en": "Learn how to use powerful tools like Laravel Forge to spin up your own servers and automatically deploy your code to it from GitHub."}

name: {"en": "Monitoring (e.g. Bugsnag)"}
description: {"en": "Stay on top of your applications performance even during development to learn when the app broke for your users."}

name: {"en": "Basic Testing"}
description: {"en": "Write code that asserts its own behavior to help you start and stay confident it does what it should."}

name: {"en": "Basic Dev-Ops"}
description: {"en": "Manage your servers and the rest of your deployment infrastructure yourself."}

name: {"en": "Laravel Vs WordPress"}
description: {"en": "Learn the differences between Laravel and WordPress and why you might choose to use Laravel for a project."}

name: {"en": "Mapping the WordPress Concepts"}
description: {"en": "Taking concepts you're already familiar with like themes and hooks, and seeing how they might be accomplished using Laravel."}

name: {"en": "Local PHP Environment For WordPress Developers"}
description: {"en": "Configuring your local environment for development outside of WordPress."}

name: {"en": "Laravel Basics For WordPress Developers"}
description: {"en": "A great starting point for developers that are new to the Laravel framework and its features."}

name: {"en": "SQL and Databases"}
description: {"en": "Learn to store, query, and modify your application's data using SQL.", "nova": "Learn to store, query, and modify your application's data using SQL."}

name: {"en": "Laravel Queues"}
description: {"en": "Learn how to create performant Laravel apps by using queues to process your time intensive tasks in the background."}

name: {"en": "Laravel Core"}
description: {"en": "Take your mastery of Laravel to the next level by diving into the internal features at the framework's core."}

name: {"en": "Auth"}
description: {"en": "Learn how to verify your application's users and other preventative measures you can take to protect your app against security vulnerabilities."}

name: {"en": "Laravel Package Development"}
description: {"en": "Enhance the functionality of your application by creating extensible packages you can share with the community."}
